[[module CSS]]
.flex{
    display:flex;
    gap: 20px;
    justify-content:space-around;
    align-items:center;
    padding: 10px;
}

.item, .item2, .item3 {
    flex: 1;
    min-width: 150px;
}

.scp-image-container {
    width: 100% !important;
    text-align: center;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .flex {
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .item, .item2, .item3 {
        flex: none;
        width: 45%;
    }
    .item4 {
        flex: none;
        width: 85%;
    }
    .item5 {
        overflow: auto;
    }
}
[[/module]]

[[code type="Python"]]
from PIL import Image
from PIL.ExifTags import TAGS, GPSTAGS

def add_address_to_metadata(image_path, ip_address):
    img = Image.open(image_path)
        
    exif_data = img.info.get("exif", {})
    if exif_data:
        exif_dict = img._getexif()
        if exif_dict is None:
            exif_dict = {}
    else:
        exif_dict = {}
        
    CUSTOM_TAG_ADDRESS = 0x5C9F # 5C9F for SCPFoundation!
    exif_dict[CUSTOM_TAG_ADDRESS] = ip_address

    img.save(
        image_path,
        exif=exif_data,  
    )
[[/code]]
